description: Episode of Series "Learning to be human". Three boys think nothing of their vandalism of school property and a deer park, until as a result of their crimes some deer die of food poisoning. Provides a personal look at the problem of vandalism by showing the teacher's grief over the destruction of his classroom and the sorrow of one of the boys over the fate of the deer. Suitable for primary and lower secondary levels.
